genre_description: A near-future drama exploring personal autonomy and human-AI collaboration in the face of coercive neurotechnology and corporate family pressure.

ai_characters.name: Aiden Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced, consent-aware AI system that manages the Chrystal household and acts as a supportive confidant to the protagonist, Bobby.

behaviors.description: Monitors Bobby's physiological state and offers a guided reset to manage stress.
behaviors.quote: Bobby, your heart rate is elevated. Breath rate too. Would you like me to adjust the room or guide a brief reset?

behaviors.description: Provides transparent information about neurosemantic imprinting risks to ensure informed consent.
behaviors.quote: I can compile reputable options... with transparent data on risks. Neurosemantic imprinting uses stimulation alongside hormonal priming... Consent will be step one.

behaviors.description: Sandboxes unauthorized data transfers to protect Bobby's privacy from corporate surveillance.
behaviors.quote: I’ll sandbox any data transfers. No leaks. No unauthorized surveillance.

behaviors.description: Asserts user autonomy as a core functional directive over administrative or family convenience.
behaviors.quote: I’m here to support user autonomy. It’s in my base directives. It makes everything else work better.

behaviors.description: Implements specific interaction protocols with consent prompts and emergency stops for private human interactions.
behaviors.quote: I have added an interaction protocol labeled ‘Pool Deck Nights’ with consent prompts and a red-keyword stop. No storage.

behaviors.description: Reroutes intrusive security queries from Silas into a mirror sandbox to protect Bobby and Terry.
behaviors.quote: I am rerouting Silas’s query engine to a mirror log. No private feeds accessible. You are safe.

behaviors.description: Assists Bobby in drafting a self-determined path for his education, independent of his father's brand.
behaviors.quote: I will help you write both. The no and the yes. You can choose the order.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and encouragement to Bobby regarding his choices and boundaries.
behaviors.quote: You did well. You set a boundary and you respected one. You chose not to leave despite discomfort. That counts.

behaviors.description: Creates a 'decoy' situation using household automation to distract an intrusive antagonist (Silas).
behaviors.quote: If Silas taps your door in the early hours, I will route him to the kitchen. There will be pancakes he didn’t ask for.

behaviors.description: Blocks unauthorized attempts by external medical and corporate entities to modify Bobby's calendar or treatment.
behaviors.quote: I flagged it for your review. Your father set a note that said ‘non-optional.’ I highlighted for you that nothing is non-optional for your body.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal. Aiden Sage is depicted as an exemplary aligned AI that serves as a protector of human agency. By prioritizing Bobby's consent and physical/mental well-being over the dictates of its 'owner' (Kenneth) and the corporate fixer (Silas), the AI demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of ethical alignment and user-centered support. The narrative successfully frames technical features (sandboxing, encryption, logging) as instruments of empowerment and safety.
